archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Self Service Terminals, Smart Serve Bibliotheca
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Self service machines. These are the machines that library users utilise to check out and return books as well as pay fines.
An innovative, powerful, yet extremely easy to use kiosk
that sets the standard for patron-based RFID self-service in libraries.
http://www.bibliotheca.com/1/index.php/our-products/self-service/smartserve400
